snippet: Leicester strengthened its place atop the Premier League without even playing as its three main title rivals all lost.
abstract: West Ham City defeats Tottenham Hotspur, 1-0; other soccer scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Leicester strengthened its place atop the Premier League without even playing as its three main title rivals all lost.

headline.main: Leicester Strengthens Place Atop Premier League
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; Idle Leicester Tightens Grip
